top_comments.comment: People will be kicking themselves in regret in few weeks, if they miss the opportunity to invest now

comments_since_last_sample.body: Faith and belief in the positive is of paramount importance. Positive momentum will begin - fear will give way to love. Those who believe in fear will remain scared and continue to attract the vary life they fear.
He Must Win for sanity sake

Parents have every right to know and to decide what they are teaching our children. We the parents make the decisions for the health and wellbeing of our children and It is NOT up to government to decide what is best. They are Not the parent! Stop trying g to control the people of this country!

The broader a child's academic education the more successful they will be.  CRT is not academics, especially in K-12.  Success comes in many forms, even if it is collecting trash.  I never agreed that there should be such disparity of wages in necessary jobs.  Congressmen and senators should NEVER receive twice, or more than twice, the salary of a garbage man.  If anything, congressmen and senator's salary should be exactly that of the highest SSI recipient.  Same with CEOs — no more than twice the top salary in a company with only increase wages for accumulated time with a company based on a beginning wage structure and a piece of the business after 10 years.
